CodeChunks.CodeChunk: Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Congrats on level 21 on BTN/MIN and all Crafters.\n More to come! :)", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(40000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Going to learn Doh/DoL classes, this profile will stop when completed!", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(20000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "You have not completed the quest Litany of Peace HW Patch 3.3.\n Please run through Heavensward MSQ to complete the quest!", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Please set the meld setting atop of Start profile to 0\n and meld any items you crafted and restart the profile.\n Info on required materia atop of Start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(40000);
